results.title: [Cross-Sectional Study on Adverse Effects of Metformin Hydrochloride on 130 Patients Type 2 Diabetic Admitted to Medical Center and Diabetes Home of Sidi Bel-Abbes].
results.text_hl: Five (3.85%) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had a total and lasting intolerance to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MetforminHydrochloride@@@ leading to its discontinuation following persistent @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhoea@@@.

citations.NLM: Sakouhi M, Matmour D, Belakhdar K, Kraroubi A. [Cross-Sectional Study on Adverse Effects of Metformin Hydrochloride on 130 Patients Type 2 Diabetic Admitted to Medical Center and Diabetes Home of Sidi Bel-Abbes]. Ann Pharm Fr. 2022 Dec 2;():. PMID: 36464072
citations.BibTeX: @article{36464072, title={[Cross-Sectional Study on Adverse Effects of Metformin Hydrochloride on 130 Patients Type 2 Diabetic Admitted to Medical Center and Diabetes Home of Sidi Bel-Abbes].}, author={Sakouhi M and Matmour D and Belakhdar K and Kraroubi A}, journal={Ann Pharm Fr}}

results.title: Rare case of diabetic neuropathic cachexia along with diabetic amyotrophy.
results.text_hl: A 65-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with background of @CHEMICAL_Alcohols @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000438 @@@alcohol@@@ excess and previous @DISEASE_Wounds_Gunshot @DISEASE_MESH:D014948 @@@gunshot wounds@@@ was admitted with significant @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Cramp</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009120 @@@leg cramps@@@, @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@ and @DISEASE_Lethargy @DISEASE_MESH:D053609 @@@lethargy@@@ for the last 3 months.

citations.NLM: Khan ZU, Ghuman N, Mak K. Rare case of diabetic neuropathic cachexia along with diabetic amyotrophy. BMJ Case Rep. 2021 May 31;14(5):. PMID: 34059533
citations.BibTeX: @article{34059533, title={Rare case of diabetic neuropathic cachexia along with diabetic amyotrophy.}, author={Khan ZU and Ghuman N and Mak K}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={14}, number={5}}

results.title: A New Mutation of the INSR Gene in a 13-Year-Old Girl with Severe Insulin Resistance Syndrome in China
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was finally diagnosed with @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@type A insulin resistance syndrome@@@. After 2 months of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ had spontaneous @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Cramp</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009120 @@@menstrual cramps@@@ and significantly improved @DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@ and sex hormones.

citations.NLM: Jin J, Liang X, Wei J, Xu L. A New Mutation of the INSR Gene in a 13-Year-Old Girl with Severe Insulin Resistance Syndrome in China Biomed Res Int. 2021;2021():8878149. PMID: 33728347
citations.BibTeX: @article{33728347, title={A New Mutation of the INSR Gene in a 13-Year-Old Girl with Severe Insulin Resistance Syndrome in China}, author={Jin J and Liang X and Wei J and Xu L}, journal={Biomed Res Int}, volume={2021}, pages={8878149}}

results.title: Metformin's impact on statin-associated muscle symptoms: An analysis of ACCORD study data and research materials from the NHLBI Biologic Specimen and Data Repository Information Coordinating Center.
results.text_hl: Unadjusted analysis showed fewer reports of @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Cramp</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009120 @@@muscle cramps@@@ (35%) and @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@leg/calve pain@@@ while walking (40%) with statins and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ compared to statin only (@<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Cramp</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009120 @@@muscle cramps@@@, 42%; @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@leg/calve pain@@@ while walking, 47%).

citations.NLM: Carris NW, Tsalatsanis A, Tipparaju SM, Cheng F, Magness RR, Kumar A. Metformin's impact on statin-associated muscle symptoms: An analysis of ACCORD study data and research materials from the NHLBI Biologic Specimen and Data Repository Information Coordinating Center. Diabetes Obes Metab. 2018 Aug;20(8):1994-1999. PMID: 29577553
citations.BibTeX: @article{29577553, title={Metformin's impact on statin-associated muscle symptoms: An analysis of ACCORD study data and research materials from the NHLBI Biologic Specimen and Data Repository Information Coordinating Center.}, author={Carris NW and Tsalatsanis A and Tipparaju SM and Cheng F and Magness RR and Kumar A}, journal={Diabetes Obes Metab}, volume={20}, number={8}, pages={1994-1999}}

results.title: Impact of 6 weeks of treatment with low-dose metformin and atorvastatin on glucose-induced changes of endothelial function in adults with newly diagnosed type 2 diabetes mellitus: A single-blind study.
results.text_hl: METHODS: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with newly diagnosed @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ were recruited and were randomly assigned to receive @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 850 mg/d or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 850 mg/d + @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ 10 mg/d for 6 weeks in a single-blind study.

citations.NLM: Tousoulis D, Koniari K, Antoniades C, Miliou A, Noutsou M, Nikolopoulou A, Papageorgiou N, Marinou K, Stefanadi E, Stefanadis C. Impact of 6 weeks of treatment with low-dose metformin and atorvastatin on glucose-induced changes of endothelial function in adults with newly diagnosed type 2 diabetes mellitus: A single-blind study. Clin Ther. 2010 Sep;32(10):1720-8. PMID: 21194594
